p: A total of 16 Holstein cows (64 functional teats without CM) of lactation duration ranging from 100 to 200 days (DEL) obtained from the Hamilton de Abreu Navarro Experimental Farm (FEHAN) located at the Campus of the Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG), in Montes Claros-MG, were enrolled in this trial from October to December 2015.
